properties.name: spring.elasticsearch.rest.kerberos.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable kerberos authentication, default true

properties.name: spring.elasticsearch.rest.kerberos.username
properties.description: The username for kerberos verified, use property 'spring.elasticsearch.username' if not configured.

properties.name: spring.elasticsearch.rest.kerberos.password
properties.description: The password for kerberos verified, use property 'spring.elasticsearch.password' if not configured.

properties.name: spring.elasticsearch.rest.kerberos.login-module
properties.description: The specify name of login module for kerberos authentication.
